project.name: catforge
project.description: An Echo AI app that generates funny themed cat images for social media. Users describe a cat (city, colour, scenery, theme) and Echo bills usage automatically via configured providers.
project.author: pxng0lin hxcker

app.page.tsx: Main UI form where users enter cat parameters (city, colour, scenery, theme) and view results.
app.actions/generate.ts: Server action that calls Echo to generate the media after building the prompt.
app.api/webhook/route.ts: Optional: webhook listener for on-chain payment confirmations.

lib.echo.ts: Initialises Echo SDK and defines which models (SDXL, HunyuanVideo) to use.
lib.utils.ts: Helper functions for prompt building and price logic.

components.ImagePreview.tsx: Displays generated image preview and sharing tools.

smart_contract.CatForgePayments.sol: Optional Base contract to log payments and emit PaymentReceived events.

workflow.title: User Input
workflow.details: Collect city, colour, scenery, and theme choices from the form.

workflow.title: Prompt Build
workflow.details: Assemble an over-the-top prompt combining every field with the chosen theme vibe.

workflow.title: AI Generation
workflow.details: Call Echo's image endpoint (e.g. GPT-Image) and await the URL response.

workflow.title: Output Display
workflow.details: Return the image URL to the frontend, show preview, and enable share/download actions.

deployment.linode: docker build -t catforge-ai . && docker run -p 3000:3000 catforge-ai

future_expansions: Echo Agent marketplace for custom cat styles
usage insights surfaced directly inside the app
